identity.name: AdOperator
identity.description: A dark, minimalist, distraction-free environment where raw product data is processed into high-performance ad copy. It feels like a high-end audio mastering console or a tactical command terminal.

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-zinc-200 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,255,255,0.1)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm font-semibold px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-zinc-800 hover:border-zinc-600 text-zinc-300 hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm px-6 py-3
buttons.ghost: text-zinc-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-zinc-900 rounded-sm px-4 py-2

cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-lg p-8
cards.solid: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800/50 rounded-lg p-6 hover:border-zinc-700 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.default: bg-zinc-950/50 border-zinc-800 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 focus:border-white/50 focus:ring-0 rounded-sm min-h-[50px]
inputs.textarea: bg-zinc-950/50 border-zinc-800 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 focus:border-white/50 focus:ring-0 rounded-sm min-h-[150px] resize-none

visual_enhancers.glow: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-tr from-white/5 to-transparent opacity-0 hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-500 pointer-events-none

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons (ChevronRight, Check, X, Loader2, Play, Pause, RotateCcw). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a thin, elegant look.

global_css.instruction: Replace the entire content with a Tailwind-based dark theme reset. Add @import for Google Fonts. Set body bg to #09090b and text to #EDEDED. Add a global '.noise' class.

tailwind_config.instruction: Extend the theme with 'manrope', 'inter', 'jetbrains' font families. Add custom colors for 'zinc-950' if needed (though built-in is fine). Add 'animate-in' keyframes if not present (tailwindcss-animate handles most).

layout_rules.general: Do not use sidebars. Use a centered layout (max-w-3xl) for the main application flow. The header should be minimal (Logo left, User right).
layout_rules.stepper: The stepper must be visible on all 'Process' pages (Input -> Strategy -> Ads -> Sim -> Decision). It should be static at the top.
layout_rules.cards: Avoid using heavy background colors for cards. Use borders and transparency. The 'Winner' card can have a subtle white glow.

accessibility.focus: All interactive elements must have a visible focus ring (ring-offset-2 ring-2 ring-zinc-500).
accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-secondary (#A1A1AA) is only used for non-critical labels. Main content must be text-primary (#EDEDED).

do_not: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds (solid dark only).
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings (use Manrope).
DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl (keep it sharp/minimal: rounded-sm or rounded-md).
DO NOT use bright blue/purple primary colors (stick to monochrome + signal colors).
must_do: MUST use 'data-testid' on all inputs and buttons.
MUST implement the 'noise' texture overlay for the authentic 'film/darkroom' feel.
